job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtabout the roleltstronggtltpgtltpgtevry health is hiring a fullstack software engineer to help us automate healthcare delivery care coordination wellness and risk managementampnbspthis is an innovative role for somebody to participate in building evry healths technology infrastructureltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtyoull write some code from scratch and also be part of integrating applications and automating testingampnbspyoull be part of the software team working alongside both application and frontend software developersltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtthe engineering efforts will include developing new portals for members and healthcare providers new mobile tools a service fabric and communications layer a machine learning layer and integrating large vendor systemsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggttechnologies we useltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtlanguages c javascript html sqlltligtltligtplatforms net core react core azure azure devopsltligtltligtprotocolsampnbspeverything pun intended from edi to message queues to apisltligtltligttools github xunit swaggerio rabbitmq microsoft teamsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtabout evry healthltstronggtltpgtltpgtour mission is to fix us healthcare evry health is a startup technology company and health insurer backed by y combinator and several silicon valley venture capital funds we build better health insurance for midsize businesses and their employees that costs up to less the company headquarters are in dallas tx usaltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtkey responsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtwrite and test fullstack web applications as part of an agile teamltligtltligtresponsible for the development support and maintenance for internally developed web applications web services integration services backend services and database systemsltligtltligtbuild systems for reliability and longterm efficiencyautomationltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtqualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtwe require a bachelors degree and years of experience is preferredltligtltligtsolid objectoriented design programming and debugging skillsltligtltligtc experienceltligtltligtstrong generalist software engineering skills ideally with experience building fullstack web applicationsltligtltligtdeep intellectual curiosityltligtltligtexcellent written and spoken communication skillsltligtltligtloves working crossfunctionally and owning projects from start to finish including the testing and qaltligtltligtbonus any experience with data science machinelearning statistics or mobile application developmentltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtlocation and benefitsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtwe have offices in dallas tx but are presently working remote until we return to the officesltligtltligtfull benefits package including health insurance k matching and vacationltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtwhy you should join evry healthltstronggtltpgtltpgtevry health has a small team that makes the software that runs evry healthampnbspwe believe our software is a key competitive advantage and we are investing aggressively in new software productsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtevry health has ambitious plans to improve the quality and accessibility of healthcare while reversing the national price inflation and the only way to reach that level of impact is to scale through software what weve built so far is probably only of what we will eventually needltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtas a member of the software team youll learn many of the ins and outs of the us healthcare systemampnbspnot only will you be growing your engineering skills but youll absorb a great deal about public health policyampnbspyour work will impact lives families and communitiesampnbspyoull also be exposed to the startup world and see how the best ideas can be nurtured and testedampnbspand of course if you ever want to start your own company youll learn a lot about that from working at evry healthltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgt
